pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:0.5: 37. The training rule on within their own country
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.2: At that time the nuns went wandering without a group of travelers where it was considered dangerous and frightening within their own country.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.4: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.5: “How can nuns go wandering without a group of travelers where it’s considered dangerous and frightening within their own country?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.6: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.9: “… How can nuns go wandering without a group of travelers where it was considered dangerous and frightening within their own country?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.10: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.11: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.12: ‘If a nun goes wandering without a group of travelers where it is considered dangerous and frightening within her own country, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.6: in the country where she is living.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.8: a place where criminals are camped, eating, standing, sitting, or lying down has been seen along that road.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.10: thieves have been seen along that road, injuring, robbing, or beating people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.12: not with a group of travelers.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.14: when the villages are a chicken’s flight apart, then for every village she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.15: If it is in an uninhabited area, in the wilderness, then for every six kilometers she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.2.2: if she travels with a group;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.2.3: if she travels where it is safe and free from danger;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.2.6: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.2.7: The seventh training rule is finished.
